value:
$WmMPID_イドゥン,ch02_14_Idenn_F_Normal,Face|In my world, I was kept in a place of
endless darkness. A void of shadow.$k$pIn the darkness, I dreamt an empty
dream...for a long time.$k$pI, too, am empty now, so I am not
troubled by appetites and desires.$k$pMy reason to be is the destruction of
humanity—to free my world...$k$pBut...this is not my world. I wonder...
Does this world require the same
freedom? It's...confusing.$k$pAll that is certain is that I...must not
stay here, at this castle.$k$pConfusion and power do not...
combine well.$k$p$WmMPID_ルゥ,ch02_15_Lugh_M_Normal,Face|Huh. Yeah, I understand why you'd
want to leave the castle now.$k$pBut...do you have anywhere to go?
You were just summoned, so it's all
new territory here, right?$k$p$WmMPID_イドゥン,ch02_14_Idenn_F_Normal,Face|Yes... I have no place to go. And I
know nothing of this world.$k$pBut as a Demon Dragon, I do know
I cannot stay here...$k$p$WmMPID_ルゥ,ch02_15_Lugh_M_Normal,Face|Hmm... Seems like you're dead set on
leaving then. If that's the case, I'll tag
along!$k$pIf we can sort out your reason for
being here now, you'll come back
to the castle again, won't you?$k$p$WmMPID_イドゥン,ch02_14_Idenn_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_ルゥ,ch02_15_Lugh_M_Normal,Face|H-hey! Wait up!$k$p...How are you so fast!$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$Fi1500|Any sign over there, Sharena?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Nothing yet!$k$pWhere could Idunn have gone? And
why? Was something troubling her?$k$p$WmMPID_ティト,ch02_17_Thite_F_Normal,Face|Hey, what are you two up to?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Oh, hi, Thea! Actually, we were
looking for Idunn... Have you seen
her?$k$p$WmMPID_ティト,ch02_17_Thite_F_Normal,Face|Idunn? The...Dark Priestess? She left
the castle, did she?$k$p$WmMPID_スー,ch02_16_Sue_F_Normal,Face|Apologies. I overheard you asking
about Idunn... I saw her speaking with
Lugh at the castle gate this morning.$k$pI was in the western spire at the time,
however, so I was unable to hear
what they were talking about...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Wait—you were able to see them all
the way from there?! They must have
looked like specks of dust!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Now that you mention it, I haven't
seen Lugh around either... Perhaps
the two of them left together.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Yeah! They could have just gone to
town to do a little shopping together!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|I—uhh... That seems unlikely.$k$p$WmMPID_ティト,ch02_17_Thite_F_Normal,Face|Whatever the case...we cannot just
stand by, can we? Lugh would have
told someone where he was going...$k$p$WmMPID_スー,ch02_16_Sue_F_Normal,Face|Right. We should search for them.
Please, allow me to assist.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Thanks. Your help means a lot. Both
of you.$k$p$WmMPID_ティト,ch02_17_Thite_F_Normal,Face|Are you comfortable riding a pegasus,
Princess Sharena? We could look for
them from the sky.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Nice plan, Thea. I'll be the navigator!
Don't worry—I give perfect directions.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Great. Then Sue and I will try to
follow their trail on the ground.$k$p$WmMPID_スー,ch02_16_Sue_F_Normal,Face|The sooner we leave, the sooner we
can find them. Let's go.$k$p
